# CPBarButton

**Class**

A button for placement in a navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
class CPBarButton
```

## Creating a CarPlay Bar Button

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a button initialized  from data in the specified coder object.
- **init(type:handler:)**: Creates a bar button with a type and handler.
- **init(image:handler:)**: Creates a bar button that displays an image.
- **init(title:handler:)**: Creates a bar button that displays a text label.
- **CPBarButton.Type**: Types of bar buttons.
- **CPBarButtonHandler**: A block that CarPlay calls when the user taps a bar button.

## Configuring the Button

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that enables and disables the bar button.
- **image**: The image displayed on the bar button.
- **title**: The title displayed on the bar button.

## Getting the Button Style

- **buttonType**: The display type for the bar button.
- **buttonStyle**: The style to use when displaying the button.
- **CPBarButtonStyle**: The display style of a bar button.

## Providing Navigation Bar Buttons

- **backButton**: A button to display as the Back button on the navigation bar.
- **leadingNavigationBarButtons**: An array of bar buttons to display on the leading side of the navigation bar.
- **trailingNavigationBarButtons**: An array of bar buttons to display on the trailing side of the navigation bar.
- **CPMessageComposeBarButton**: A button that activates Siri and initiates the compose message flow.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- CPMessageComposeBarButton

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
